about_the_game:
Engage in fisticuffs with friends online or on the couch. Up to 8 players can dispute online!

A gentleman always comes prepared! Grab over-the-top items from around the map to wield against friends. Bring bombs and baseball bats to battle. Lay down explosive mines and hide snapping bear traps. Pop a champagne bottle for your foes!

PICK YOUR PERKS

Pick a stackable perk between each round to build a battle-ready gentleman. Spill slippery trails of oil, supersize your traps, or launch yourself from cannons! With each passing round, the tournament grows more and more mad.

SHATTER AND SMASH

A gentleman throws down wherever dispute strikes, be it gardens, ballrooms, or private islands. Each environment is entirely destructible– after all, what are luxuries worth if you can’t call yourself a winner?

Each stage contains absurd hazards including artillery cannons, precariously placed crystal chandeliers, even a pet shark, Rufus.

KEY FEATURES

  • Play with up to 4 players locally or up to 8 online in ridiculous PvP matches.

  • Wield dozens of insane items to win the match.

  • Pick new perks with each passing round. Build a winning gentleman as the tourney spirals into disarray.

  • Destroy pristine and luxurious destructible environments.

  • Use absurd hazards to your advantage in each stage.

  • Customize your character with an assortment of colorful coats and extremely fashionable hats.

  • Marvel at the beauty of ragdoll physics as gentlemen take flight.

name: A Gentlemen's Dispute

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd Generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Be the last gentleman standing in this old-fashioned, slapstick party brawler! Wield preposterous items and stack insane perks to cause maximum chaos. Destroy private islands, gardens, and elegant ballrooms. Anything it takes to prove you’re the most gentlemanly of them all!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
